saladsoup.description: 楓糖烤美洲豹瓜、青蘋果、烤南瓜子、咖哩香料鮮奶油

entrees.name: 紅酒燉牛肋骨

cocktails.name: 拉迪阿布拉 (LA DIABLA)
cocktails.description: El Cristiano Reposado龍舌蘭酒、青檸汁、Aperol、Orgeat杏仁糖漿、Pamplemousse西柚酒、蛋白、燻紅辣椒、鹽邊緣

cocktails.name: 見你的造物主 (MEET YOUR MAKER)

cocktails.name: 戈登的筆記 (NOTES FROM GORDON)

cocktails.name: 公爵夫人 (THE DUCHESS)

cocktails.name: 辣椒鴿 (ANCHO PALOMA)
